docs.snippet: Sport shoes maker Skechers USA Inc said on Friday it will explore buying a stake in the Los Angeles Clippers basketball team, whose owner is at the center of a controversy over alleged racist remarks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sport shoes maker Skechers USA Inc said on Friday it will explore buying a stake in the Los Angeles Clippers basketball team, whose owner is at the center of a controversy over alleged racist remarks.

headline.main: Skechers Considering Taking Stake in LA Clippers
headline.print_headline: Skechers Considering Taking Stake in LA Clippers

docs.snippet: Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling, newly banned from basketball over racist comments attributed to him, has been battling prostate cancer, sports network ESPN and other media reported on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling, newly banned from basketball over racist comments attributed to him, has been battling prostate cancer, sports network ESPN and other media reported on Thursday.

headline.main: Los Angeles Clippers Owner Sterling Battling Cancer: Report

docs.snippet: The president of the Los Angeles chapter of the NAACP resigned Thursday in ongoing fallout over racist comments made by the owner of the Clippers basketball team, who had been slated to be honored by the organization with a lifetime achievement aw...
docs.lead_paragraph: The president of the Los Angeles chapter of the NAACP resigned Thursday in ongoing fallout over racist comments made by the owner of the Clippers basketball team, who had been slated to be honored by the organization with a lifetime achievement award.

headline.main: Civil Rights Leader Resigns, Caught in Scandal Over NBA Team Owner's Racist Rant
headline.print_headline: Civil Rights Leader Resigns, Caught in Scandal Over NBA Team Owner's Racist Rant

headline.main: Clippers Coach Meets With Angry Employees

docs.snippet: A Hollywood studio executive who investigators said may have been murdered was declared dead on Thursday, the second anniversary of his mysterious disappearance, the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Hollywood studio executive who investigators said may have been murdered was declared dead on Thursday, the second anniversary of his mysterious disappearance, the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department said.

headline.main: Missing Hollywood Executive Declared Dead: Los Angeles County Official
headline.print_headline: Missing Hollywood Executive Declared Dead: Los Angeles County Official

docs.snippet: The National Basketball Association on Thursday launched its bid to oust Donald Sterling as owner of the Los Angeles Clippers for racist comments as a panel of 10 fellow team owners or their proxies unanimously agreed to proceed "as expeditiously ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The National Basketball Association on Thursday launched its bid to oust Donald Sterling as owner of the Los Angeles Clippers for racist comments as a panel of 10 fellow team owners or their proxies unanimously agreed to proceed "as expeditiously as possible," the NBA said.

headline.main: NBA Panel Agrees to Act Swiftly on Bid to Oust Clippers Owner
headline.print_headline: NBA Panel Agrees to Act Swiftly on Bid to Oust Clippers Owner

docs.snippet: Mr. Budd, a senior at Villanova University, set the record for the 100-yard dash at 9.2 seconds in 1961, a year after competing at the Rome Olympics....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Budd, a senior at Villanova University, set the record for the 100-yard dash at 9.2 seconds in 1961, a year after competing at the Rome Olympics.
docs.abstract: Frank Budd, former Olympic sprinter who was considered the world's fastest human after setting 100-yard dash record in 1961, dies at age 74.

headline.main: Frank Budd, Once Known as World’s Fastest Human, Dies at 74
